hero.subtitle: Professional support on the path to your mastery starts with choosing the right coach or instructor. I'm here to help you achieve your climbing goals and grow in this exciting discipline. Together, we can create a training plan tailored to your needs and abilities, helping you reach your goals. See you at training! Thank you for your trust!

offer.title: Our offer
offer.subtitle: Choose a training format that suits your needs and skill level

courses.title: Courses
courses.description: Climbing courses preparing you for independent and safe climbing on rock and artificial walls. Training sessions are led by experienced PZA instructors.
courses.item1: Via ferrata climbing course per PZA program - 900 PLN
courses.item2: Multi-pitch via ferrata climbing 2 days - 800 PLN

trainings.title: Training sessions
trainings.description: Regular training sessions in small groups or individually. Develop your strength, technique, and endurance under the guidance of Next Step Pro Climbing coaches.

workshops.title: Workshops
workshops.description: Specialized thematic sessions. Focus on specific aspects of climbing in an intensive format.

cta.title: Ready to take the first step?
cta.subtitle: Check available time slots and sign up for your chosen sessions. We look forward to seeing you!
